title: D20 Blockchain
descript: D20 Blockchain service is the first system micro service, which provides storage mechanism of the state.
D20 Blockchain is a unique logical chain of valid transactions through twenty dimensional chains.
To develop the chain healthy and fairly, a blind auction as auction event service is provided.

children.title: Dimensional chain
descript: Dimensional chain is an independent chain of corresponding blocks.
There are three types of chain

children.title: Base chain
descript: Base chain is the chain of D0(base) blocks in dimension 0.
Base block is the most inner dimensional block of D20 Block.
A base block contains fresh transactions.

children.title: Inter chain
descript: Inter chain is the chain of Dk(inter) blocks, when Dk is dimension of the chain.
Dimension of an inter chain is from 1 to 18.
An inter block contains two fresh Dk-1 blocks.

children.title: Crown chain
descript: Crown chain is the chain of D19(crown) blocks in dimension 19.
Crown block is the most outer dimensional block of D20 Block.
A crown block contains two fresh D18 blocks.
